result.execSummary:
Chad Wayne Brown was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Chad Wayne Brown was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chad Wayne Brown

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Megan E. Kelly, DF ATTY: Alex Andrea, DF: Chad Wayne Brown appeared from jail.  Court called at 2:27 p.m.  Defendant wishes to voluntarily waive extradition.  Court questions the DE.  Court finds the DE freely, volutarily and knowingly waives extradition. Defendant executes Waiver and court certifies same.  Court adjourned at 2:32 p.m. lw

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Alexis S. Mckinley,  DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  Chad Wayne Brown appeared from jail. Atty Kucinski requests date for extradition hearing and still contesting the extradition. Atty Kucinski waives the time limits. Bond continues in form and amount.  Extradition hearing scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 10:00 am.
CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Megan E. Kelly, DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Chad Wayne Brown appeared from jail.  Court called.  Court sets bond.  Court adjourned.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Megan E. Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Chad Wayne Brown appeared from jail. Court confirms address. Defendant has a felony warrant out of Lea County New Mexico.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 16, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
